titleStmt.title: The apprentices lamentation together, vvith a dolefull elegie upon the manner of the death of that worthy, and valorous Knight Sr. Richard Wiseman.
titleStmt.author: P.W.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Thus died the mirrour of the times;".
Place of publication and publication date from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
